wikitext.*:
'''vomentie''' is [[Telerin]] for "meeting (of two)", cognate of the [[Quenya]] ''[[omentie]]''.

It is only attested with a pronominal ending inflected for genitive: [[vomentienguo]] "of our meeting".<ref>[[The War of the Jewels|War of the Jewels]] p. 407</ref>

==Etymology==
The word contains the prefix ''[[vó|vo-]]''.
